info.description: API for test generation system with LLM integration and Moodle export
info.title: Test Generation System API

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token
Register a new user account with default student role

get.description: Get paginated list of documents uploaded by the current user

post.description: Upload a document file (PDF, DOCX, PPTX, TXT, MD) for processing

400.description: Invalid input or unsupported file type

get.description: Get details of a specific document by its ID

delete.description: Delete a document and its associated file

post.description: Extract text content from an uploaded document

400.description: Invalid document ID or file type

get.description: Retrieve list of available courses from Moodle
Export a test and its questions to Moodle XML format for download
get.summary: Export test to Moodle XML format

400.description: Invalid test ID or test has no questions

post.description: Synchronize a test with Moodle by uploading it as a quiz to a specified course

400.description: Invalid input or test has no questions

get.description: Check if the Moodle server connection is working properly
Get paginated list of tests created by the current user

post.description: Create a new test with optional document association
Generate test questions from a document using LLM

400.description: Invalid input or document not parsed

get.description: Get details of a specific test by its ID

delete.description: Delete a test and all its associated questions

get.description: Get paginated list of all users (admin only)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
